form.description: The domain should be your email domain name. i.e., it should be example.com if your email is yourname@example.com
Create a default subdomain or host based on the domain and an owner of the host with host-admin role. Default to test and it can be changed.
You can choose another user to be the org owner and org-admin role will be switched.
A host is a sub domain that can be an environment or region. For example: dev, sit, stg, prd or ca, us, eu etc.
